Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): What is Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)?

(14) Enterprise-level Access Control

  • RBAC is a good model for large organizations
  • Defining useful roles/permissions is critical
  • RBAC is one point on the IAM design spectrum
    • Access Control List (ACL) is a simpler approch
    • Attribute-Based Access Control (ABAC) is more complex/powerful


Conclusions Erik Wilde (@dret): What is Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)?
